entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Puvirnituq

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
